Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Directs the department of veterans' services to establish and operate an electronic database of the number of openings in each of the 4 state veterans' homes and the number of persons on the waiting lists
Summary: Directs the department of veterans' services to establish and operate an electronic database of the number of openings in each of the 4 state veterans' homes and the number of persons on the waiting list for each such veterans' home.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Veterans' Services L; add ยง2636, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law and the public health law, in relation to directing the department of veterans' services to establish and operate a publicly accessible electronic database of the availability of openings for admission to state veterans' homes
